name: Brosix Live Chat
author: Brosix Inc.

sections.description:
WordPress Chat Plugin

Use the WordPress Live Chat Plugin by Brosix to add live chat support to your WordPress website quickly and effortlessly. Provide instant communication with on-site visitors and customers and enable a prompt resolution to their questions or concerns.

Increase your sales and build stronger customer relationships with a fully functional WordPress live chat plugin.

Chat with website visitors from the convenience of a desktop application on your computer, a mobile application on your phone or tablet, and a web application on any web browser.

Benefits

Brosix’s Live Chat plugin allows you to engage directly with your customers and website guests. It’s simple to set up and easily integrates into your website. The Live Chat plugin is an integrated feature in Brosix private team communication networks.

Through the Brosix Live Chat plugin you can improve your customer support accessibility, easily monitor live chat agents’ communications, boost your sales and client conversions, and much more!

Brosix LiveChat Plugin Features:

  • Simple to set up, use and administer
  • Encrypted messaging with customers and between agents
  • Dedicated chat room on Brosix networks for agents
  • Customized groups for agents
  • Three availability options for agents
  • Several plugin color options
  • Custom plugin placement on right or left side of the webpage
  • Agent applications for Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android and web

About Brosix

Brosix is an Instant Messaging Software for businesses designed with team communication in mind. It’s a tool that provides team members with encrypted, real-time communications across multiple platforms that streamline how day-to-day business gets done. At the same time, Brosix gives managers full control over all accounts and communication, allowing for effective administration. Brosix also allows live chat agents to communicate with each other in real time in order to resolve issues and answer customer enquiries.
sections.installation:
Automated Installation

  1. Go to your WordPress admin dashboard, then find the “Plugins” menu.
  2. Click on “Add New” and search for “Brosix Live Chat”.
  3. Activate the “Brosix Live Chat” plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  4. Click the Live Chat menu on the left.
  5. Create a new account or sign-in if you already have a Brosix account.

Manual Installation

  1. Upload brosix-live-chat directory to WordPress plugins directory (/wp-content/plugins/).
  2. Activate the “Brosix Live Chat” plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Click the Live Chat menu on the left.
  4. Create a new account or sign-in if you already have a Brosix account.

For more detailed instructions, go to the live chat page.
sections.faq:
How much does Brosix cost?

Brosix is FREE for all WordPress users to install and run Live Chat on their website and support their customers with one agent. The agent can use Brosix apps to respond to website visitors on all major platforms – Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS and Web.

For additional agents you can upgrade to the paid Premium plan, which also provides a wider range of collaboration and administration features, that will make your team more productive.

Is the Live Chat widget customizable?

Yes it is. You can set different levels of availability for Live Chat widget: always available, available when an agent is online, and available only during set business hours. You can also adjust the placement of the widget on the left or right sides of your webpage, and set a color of your choice for the Live Chat icon.

Can I use Brosix on more than one website?

Yes, there are two options to use Brosix on multiple websites. You can use the same chat on every website or you can create different projects for each website, allowing you to manage each one separately.

Is there a mobile application?

Yes, there are both iOS and Android mobile apps. You can download them from the App Store or Google Play.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Brosix Live Chat

1.1.0

Added functionality to hide live chat on home page.
Modified color scheme.
Minor fixes.

short_description: Chat directly with your website visitors. Free, fast, easy to install and to use. Turn your visitors into happy customers!
